title: MAX5033BUSA+__AnalogDevices_8125_componentsearchengine
description: Voltage regulator with adjustable output voltage and various fixed output voltage options.

---
## Pin Description

---

|   PIN | NAME    | FUNCTION                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|-------|---------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | BST     | Boost Capacitor Connection. Connect a 0.1μF ceramic capacitor from BST to LX.                                                                                                                                                                            |
|     2 | VD      | Internal Regulator Output. Bypass VD to GND with a 0.1μF ceramic capacitor.                                                                                                                                                                              |
|     3 | SGND    | Internal Connection. SGND must be connected to GND.                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|     4 | FB      | Output Sense Feedback Connection. For fixed output voltage (MAX5033A, MAX5033B, MAX5033C), connect FB to V OUT . For adjustable output voltage (MAX5033D), use an external resistive voltage- divider to set V OUT . V FB regulating set point is 1.22V. |
|     5 | ON/ OFF | Shutdown Control Input. Pull ON/ OFF low to put the device in shutdown mode. Drive ON/ OFF high for normal operation.                                                                                                                                    |
|     6 | GND     | Ground.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|     7 | V IN    | Input Voltage. Bypass V IN to GND with a low-ESR capacitor as close to the device as possible.                                                                                                                                                           |
|     8 | LX      | Source Connection of Internal High-Side Switch.                                                                                                                                                                                                          |

---
## Pin Description

---

|   PIN | NAME    | FUNCTION                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|-------|---------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | BST     | Boost Capacitor Connection. Connect a 0.1μF ceramic capacitor from BST to LX.                                                                                                                                                                            |
|     2 | VD      | Internal Regulator Output. Bypass VD to GND with a 0.1μF ceramic capacitor.                                                                                                                                                                              |
|     3 | SGND    | Internal Connection. SGND must be connected to GND.                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|     4 | FB      | Output Sense Feedback Connection. For fixed output voltage (MAX5033A, MAX5033B, MAX5033C), connect FB to V OUT . For adjustable output voltage (MAX5033D), use an external resistive voltage- divider to set V OUT . V FB regulating set point is 1.22V. |
|     5 | ON/ OFF | Shutdown Control Input. Pull ON/ OFF low to put the device in shutdown mode. Drive ON/ OFF high for normal operation.                                                                                                                                    |
|     6 | GND     | Ground.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|     7 | V IN    | Input Voltage. Bypass V IN to GND with a low-ESR capacitor as close to the device as possible.                                                                                                                                                           |
|     8 | LX      | Source Connection of Internal High-Side Switch.                                                                                                                                                                                                          |

---"]
